name: O No! She's Grabbing The Mic!
name_original: O No! She's Grabbing The Mic!
description:
This game was made for the Ludum Dare 37 Jam.

Your band 'The Teables' is recording their next track, but guess who shows up? Her whiny voice will ruin the recording, unless you as the manager keep her away from the microphones.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move.

Spacebar to shout and wave to send her away.

Have fun!
